entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 60%
